definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wipe, wipe out (NH id.; Ar. mah.a0, efface, erase, cancel, obliterate; Aram. [[מְחָא]] (I), cf. Ph. [[למחת]]  acc. to stroke = exactly Hoffin:Ph. Inschr., Abh. GGW, xxxvi. May 1889, 9).—

wipe, the mouth Pr 30:20; tears from ([[מעל]]) the face Is 25:8; written curse, into the water ([[אל־מים]]) for drinking Nu 5:23 (P); Moses' name from the book ([[מספר]]) of God Ex 32:32, Ex 32:33 (J); [[וּמָחִיתִי אֶת־]] [[יְרוּשָׁלִַם כַּאֲשֶׁר יִמְחֶה אֶת־הַצַּלַּחַת מָחָה וְהָפַךְ עַל־פָּנֶיהָ]] 2Ki 21:13 and I will wipe Jerusalem as one wipeth a dish,—he doth wipe and turn it (but rd. prob. [[מָחׂה וְהָפׂךְ]]) upside down.

blot out = obliterate from the memory, [[מִתַּחַת הַשָּׁמַיִם]] from under heaven e.g. the name De 9:14, De 29:19, 2Ki 14:27; the remembrance Ex 17:14, Ex 17:14 (J), De 25:19; the name for ever Ps 9:6; transgressions ([[פשׁע]]; no more remembered by God against sinner) Ps 51:3, Is 43:25, Is 44:22; [[עָון]] Ps 51:11.

blot out = exterminate, [[כל־היקוֹם]] all existing things Ge 7:23 (J) and mankind, [[מֵעַל פְּנֵי הָאֲדָמָה]] Ge 6:7, Ge 7:4 (J); [[מׂחוֹת מְלָכִין]] Pr 31:3 (with the text-change, v. supr.) = destroyers of kings (i.e. impure women), but expression strange and dubious.
be blotted out, [[מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל]] of a name De 25:6, a tribe Ju Jdg 21:17; name (‖ posterity) Ps 109:13; from memory, of sins Ne 3:37, Ps 109:14; reproach, Pr 6:33.
be exterminated, [[מִן־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 7:23 (J); of idolatrous works of Israel Ez Eze 6:6.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תֶּ֫מַח]] Ne 13:14; [[תֶָּמְחִי]] Je 18:23 (but tone suggests [[תֶּ֫מַח]] cf. Ges:§ 75. R. 17; Gie reads Qal and doubts Hiph. altogether); Inf. [[לַמְחוֹת]] Pr 31:3 ( = [[לְהַמְחוֹת]] but see

definitions.title: Qal 3
definitions.body: );—blot out, from the memory; pious acts Ne 13:14; sins Je 18:23.
